name: Buccaneer Bill
description:
Ahoy! 

Are ya looking for a retro adventure filled with challenges, bosses and treasure? Then this be yar game! Play as a Buccaneer Bill -- a dashing booty lover who has come across a mysterious treasure map. 

General info:

This is just a quick prototype for a game jam. If people think it has potential I'll turn it into a real NES game.

Controls:

Controls mimic NES controls;

Action buttons are jump and fire.

Start pauses the game.

Select changes weapon.
